content: p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 un cid 415 l all s cid 415 tches are used up © silke strohschenk please respect my work for private use only 4 a cid 425 en cid 415 on the gusset decreases are every fourth row different to what you are used gusset 1 rs sl1wyb knit all heel s cid 415 tches pm pick up and knit 13 14/16 s cid 415 tches along the le cid 332 side of your heel flap turn work you might find one pick up missing to avoid a hole you can pick up all and knit the last 2 together 1 ws sl1pwyf p 12 13/15 sm p heel sts pm pick up with your le cid 332 needle 13 14/16 s cid 415 tches along the right side of your heel flap and purl them you might find one pick up missing to avoid a hole you can pick up all pick up a first bind-off s cid 415 tch from the side of your instep flap and purl 3 together turn work *7 note this is fiddly so cheat with this just make sure that you will have 13 14/16 s cid 415 tches on the sides before and a cid 332 er the markers 2 rs sl1wyb k12 13/15 sm ssk k to 2sts before m k2tog sm k to last s cid 415 tch pick up 1 bind-off st from your instep flap ssk turn work attention skip every 10th cast-on and bind-off s cid 415 tch or your sole will be longer than your instep with given swatch 2 ws sl1pwyf p to last st with slipping markers pick up the next bind-off s cid 415 tch from the side of your instep flap and p2tog turn work 3 rs sl1wyb k to last s cid 415 tch with slipping markers pick up 1 bind-off st from your instep flap ssk turn work 3 ws sl1pwyf p to last st with slipping markers pick up the next bind-off s cid 415 tch from the side of your instep flap and p2tog turn work repeat 2 rs 2 ws 3 rs 3 ws un cid 415 l you have 2 sts le cid 332 between your markers © silke strohschenk please respect my work for private use only 5 foot you have got 28 30/34 s cid 415 tches on your sole needle remove markers and keep working rs and ws working the ssk and k2tog to connect the sole and the instep un cid 415 l all cast-on and bind-off s cid 415 tches on the side of your instep flap are used up ending with a ws toe k 28 30/34 sole sts pm pick up and knit 28 30/34 sts over the instep flap pm for bor start working in the round k all s cid 415 tches slipping the markers un cid 415 l you reach 4cm 4 5cm/4 5cm before end of foot
